name: Culinaria Europe e. V.
goal: The association purposes to represent and promote the common general and technical interests as well as to contribute to the advancement and the fostering of professional expertise of the industrial producers producers of culinary products (e.g. soups, bouillons, sauces, salads, mustard, vinegar, horseradish)in Europe. The association does not intend any own aconomic purposes or pursue any profit making activity.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumer Affairs, Food Safety
euInitiatives:
Country of origin labelling
Harmonization of nutrition labelling
Food additives
Salt reduction
Code of Practice Fruit and Vegetables in Vinegar
